messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] The conference in NC
messages.msgSnippet: I feel like a real newbie as I can not find any info on this on the site.  I can not even find the classified section!  I would love to know more about the
messages.messageBody:
I feel like a real newbie as I can not find any info on this on the
site. I can not even find the classified section! I would love to
know more about the conference, however.

Jane



Last episode starsuncloud@..., had this to say:

>I am currently putting together a sort of geographical type trade for anyone
>that is attending the conference in NC this October. Each of us bringing
>something unique to our area to share with some unschooling.commies.
>If you're coming to the conference and interested in participating, you can
>find the discussion at www.unschooling.com under the Classified section.
>Hope to see you there!
>Ren
>
>
>~~~ Don't forget! If you change the topic, change the subject line! ~~~
>
>To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
>Unschooling-dotcom-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
>
>Visit the Unschooling website:
>http://www.unschooling.com
>
>
>
>Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/

I may not have gone where I intended to go, but I think I have ended
up where I intended to be.
- Douglas Adams

messages.subject: The conference in NC
messages.msgSnippet: I am currently putting together a sort of geographical type trade for anyone that is attending the conference in NC this October. Each of us bringing something
messages.messageBody:
I am currently putting together a sort of geographical type trade for anyone
that is attending the conference in NC this October. Each of us bringing
something unique to our area to share with some unschooling.commies.
If you're coming to the conference and interested in participating, you can
find the discussion at www.unschooling.com under the Classified section.
Hope to see you there!
Ren
